# Tukey Ribbons

```{r}
ggpk_tukey_ribbons <- function(...) {
  # Tukey Box Edges
  ggpack(geom_ribbon,
    stat = 'summary',
    fun.data = function(d) c(
      y = median(d),
      ymax = quantile(d, 0.75, names = FALSE),
      ymin = quantile(d, 0.25, names = FALSE)),
    alpha = 0.15, 
    ..., 
    fill = ..color..,
    color = NA)  +
    
  # Tukey Whiskers
  ggpack(geom_ribbon,
    stat = 'summary',
    fun.data = function(d) {
      d <- sort(d)
      c(y = median(d),
        ymax = d[tail(which(d <
          quantile(d, 0.75, names = FALSE)
          + 1.5 * IQR(d)), 1)],
        ymin = d[head(which(d >
          quantile(d, 0.25, names = FALSE)
          - 1.5 * IQR(d)), 1)])
    },
    alpha = 0.15,
    ...,
    fill = ..color..,
    color = NA) +

  # Median Line
  ggpack(geom_line,
    stat = 'summary',
    fun.data = function(d) c(y = median(d)),
    alpha = 0.8,
    size = 1.5,
    ...)
}
```

```{r}
library(Hmisc)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

nasa <- dplyr::nasa %>% 
  as.data.frame %>%
  mutate(time = as_date(years(year-1970) + months(month)))
  
ggplot(nasa) + 
  aes(x = time, y = temperature) + 
  ggpk_tukey_ribbons(na.rm = TRUE)
```
